Class Bulbasaur

java.lang.Object
battle.logic.Pokemon
battle.pokemons.Bulbasaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bulbasaur extends Pokemon implements Serializable
Represents the Pokemon Bulbasaur. This class extends the Pokemon class and implements Serializable.
